name: Eternal Sin
description:
Eternal Sin

While driving home on a dark and dreary night, booze still fresh on his lips and pills perched firmly within his palm, Edmund Lowe contemplates how different his life could have been. He wakes up to find himself in a nearby town somehow familiar to him, yet unfamiliar at the same time.

Edmund must uncover the truth behind where he is and what has happened as he searches the town, hoping to find some answer to his whereabouts. The notes he finds along the way may so happen to provide an answer for his sudden return. However, the more he delves deeper into the town, he begins to awaken the horrors that lie beneath the surface.

He must find the keys and get out before they come for him!

Dare you enter the nightmare and find an escape before Edmund’s past catches up to him?
